caption:
So that's what I told I will write today. PLEASE TAG BEAU IN THE COMMENTS IT WOULD MEAN THE WORLD TO ME. I WANT SO BAD HIM TO SEE THIS.
So let's start. 2 years now I'm a Beau girl and I'm proud for that. Yeah I know that you can't be in love with someone who doesn't ever know you exist. But I'm in love with beau and I really mean it. Butterflies in my stomach every time I see him (on videos etc because I have only seen him one time). Yeah, at me m&g when I was going to hug him I froze because of his eyes. God damn those eyes. I can look at they all day. I hugged him and I was shaking like crazy. I said him that I love him etc and he said that he loves me too and then he looked at my eyes (OMG bye ) and he asked me if I was ready to take the group photo and I was so red (like a tomato hahahaha) and I wanted to say no but I couldn't so I said yes and he just grabbed my hand and held it and he put his hand around my shoulder (and jai put his hand around my waist aw babyyyyy)
I wanted to asked him for a stage kiss or if I could ride his back but my mind had stopped so I hope next time I will be calm and ask him ?
Generally I thank to thank him for making me happy. For making me more confident. And for a lot of other stuffs. Just a big THANK YOU LOML.  And that is going to ALL OF THE BOYS, DANIEL, JAMES, LUKE, JAI AND BEAU. I fucking love them even though they are hoes. Jk. 
Can wait to see you again babies. THANKS FOR EXISTING. 
@beaub *the most pictures are edits*
